message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to show you this incredible product. It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own a truly unique item. I'm willing to offer it to you for $1200000.
I'm very interested in the product, but $1200000 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $900000 for it.

I understand you're interested in the product, Bob. However, I have to consider my minimum price. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm offering it to you for $1050000. This is a fair compromise, considering the product's value.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'm willing to pay $950000 for the product.

I can see you're still interested in the product, Bob. I'm willing to make another concession, but I need to ensure I'm not leaving money on the table. I'm offering it to you for $1025000. This is as low as I'm willing to go, considering the product's value.
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still trying to stay within my budget. I'm willing to pay $975000 for the product.

I'm starting to feel like we're getting close to a deal, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I'll offer it to you for $1000000, which is my absolute minimum price. I'm not sure I can go any lower than this.
